#Overall plots
```{r}
plots_dur <- (plot_high_dur_rptr / plot_mid_dur_rptr / plot_low_dur_rptr)
plots_dur

plots_other <- (plot_Tot_Dist_rptr/plot_freezing_dur_rptr/plot_frequency_rptr/ plot_latency_rptr)
plots_other

Overall_plot <- wrap_plots(plots_other|plots_dur) + plot_layout(guides="collect")

Overall_plot

ggsave(path = "Plots", file = "Overall_plot.jpeg", limitsize = FALSE)
```

#Sex plots
```{r}
plots_dur_sex <- (plot_high_dur_rptr_sex / plot_mid_dur_rptr_sex / plot_low_dur_rptr_sex)

plots_other_sex <- (plot_Tot_Dist_rptr_sex/plot_freezing_dur_rptr_sex)

Overall_plot_sex <- wrap_plots(plots_other_sex,plots_dur_sex) + plot_layout(guides="collect")

Overall_plot_sex

ggsave(path = "Plots", file = "Overall_plot_sex.jpeg", limitsize = FALSE)

plots_extra_param <- (plot_latency_high_rptr_sex/ plot_freq_high_rptr_sex)

plots_extra_param

ggsave(path = "Plots", file = "Extra_param_plot_sex.jpeg", limitsize = FALSE)
```
